statements: SELECT id, date, time, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT energy_usage, date FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC
SELECT id, time, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE time >= '08:00:00'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage, DAYOFWEEK(date) AS day_of_week FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY day_of_week
SELECT date, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_usage FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY date HAVING total_usage > 500
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, date, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_reading > 100;
SELECT id, time FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY time;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_analysis WHERE peak_demand < 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_reading > 100;
SELECT date, time, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, SUM(energy_reading) AS total_energy FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY id;
SELECT date, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_analysis WHERE peak_demand > 50 GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100
SELECT consumer_id, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT consumer_id, consumer_name, address FROM consumer_details WHERE address IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM energy_optimization WHERE optimization_result LIKE '%successful%' ORDER BY optimization_date
SELECT consumer_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY consumer_id
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT consumer_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY consumer_id;
SELECT ed.consumer_id, ed.consumer_name, eo.optimization_date FROM consumer_details ed JOIN energy_optimization eo ON ed.consumer_id = eo.consumer_id;
SELECT consumer_id, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY consumer_id ORDER BY max_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT consumer_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS average_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 GROUP BY consumer_id ORDER BY average_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT category_name FROM energy_consumption_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, country FROM energy_consumption_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed, MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT category_name, location_name, country FROM energy_consumption_categories c JOIN energy_consumption_locations l ON c.category_id = l.location_id;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed, YEAR(date) AS year FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY YEAR(date) HAVING avg_energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM energy_consumption_locations WHERE city = 'New York');
SELECT E.analysis_id, E.timestamp, E.result, L.location_name FROM energy_consumption_analysis E LEFT JOIN energy_consumption_locations L ON E.analysis_id = L.location_id ORDER BY E.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_info;
SELECT source_name, energy_type FROM energy_sources ORDER BY source_id DESC;
SELECT cost_id, timestamp, cost_per_unit, currency FROM energy_costs WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_date FROM energy_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT source_name, energy_type FROM energy_sources WHERE source_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY source_name;
SELECT * FROM energy_costs WHERE currency = 'USD' AND cost_per_unit > 0.5 ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_date, result FROM energy_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date
